extendedInfo.description: This app is for police academy recruits in Florida.  This app will help you pass each block exams while in the academy, as well as your state certification exam.This app should be used only by current subscribers of the Police Academy Study Guides Website.  If you are a current subscriber, you can use your current login information to gain access to the site. For everyone else, this app is Free to download, however a subscription is required to view content.  This app also includes the Police Jobs search 100% Free.  You can also download that app separately if you like or use the study guides and search in one app. Only download this app if you are currently a subscriber to the Police Academy Study Guides Website at www.myfloridapoliceexams.com - or are planning on becoming a subscriber.  Good luck everyone on your exams.  Remember to stay safe out there.

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Isn\'t free at all....app sucks..don\'t waste your time downloading it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its not even free
reviews.comment: You have to pay 11.00 to see the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Yes of course you have to pay for it. It\'s cheap! It\'s study guides for law enforcement and corrections academy. It\'s such a great tool to use while you\'re studying. It\'s gotten me top exam grades in my class. Suck it up and for the the tool...having it on your phone is free. I wish it would have a more app friendly site for when u are on your phone...but I\'ll take it!
reviews.author: Alicia Miller
